New Records: Rohit Sharma scored the fastest 50 runs against Australia in a T20 match (19 balls) during the 2024 T20 World Cup semi-final against Australia on June 24, 2024.
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma's exceptional batting performance with 92 runs off 41 balls led India to a 24-run victory over Australia.
Australia's chase was derailed by key dismissals of David Warner and Glenn Maxwell, which proved pivotal in the match outcome.
Post-Match Reflections: The match result means Australia's T20 World Cup campaign is on the brink, dependent on Afghanistan's performance against Bangladesh.
David Warner's potential retirement if Australia fails to progress was noted, adding an emotional layer to the outcome.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article mentions the impact of the match on Australia's World Cup journey, highlighting the significance of subsequent matches.
